meanings.definition: The action of renovating or improving something, especially a building.
meanings.sent1: The refurbishments on the old library made it look brand new.
meanings.sent2: The company invested in refurbishments to enhance the appearance of their office.
meanings.sent3: The refurbishments on the playground equipment made the children cheer with joy.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity was like refurbishments on a dull canvas, transforming it into a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The refurbishments on the historic clock tower brought it back to life.

meanings.definition: The process of cleaning, repairing, or restoring something to good condition.
meanings.sent1: Regular refurbishments of the machinery kept the factory running smoothly.
meanings.sent2: The refurbishments on the antique car made it shine like new.
meanings.sent3: The refurbishments on the old bike turned it into a shiny ride.
meanings.sent4: Her positive attitude was like refurbishments on a gloomy day, brightening everything around her.
meanings.sent5: The refurbishments on the neglected garden transformed it into a beautiful oasis.
